name: Bolinas.github.io
tagline: Rule Extraction and Parsing Tools for Synchronous Hyperedge Replacement Grammars
body:
### Welcome to Bolinas.

This is the new public home for Bolinas.

You can find our repository here:

[Bolinas](https://www.github.com/karlmoritz/bolinas)


To modify this website:
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Authors and Contributors

Jacob Andreas
Daniel Bauer
David Chiang
Karl Moritz Hermann
Bevan Jones
Kevin Knight
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
